text: Irámuco is a community located 17 kilometres southwest of the city of Acámbaro in the state of Guanajuato, Mexico. The original name of Irámuco is Imurac, from the Purépecha language, meaning: Hill that goes in to the lake. The ruler of this village was guatimurac (prince of the hill that goes in to the lake). == References == Category:Settlements in Guanajuato (state)
title: Irámuco
